articles.title: Former PM Kevin Rudd tells United States to stop throwing allies 'under a bus' to limit Chinese influence in the region - ABC News
articles.description: Former prime minister and incoming ambassador to Washington Kevin Rudd claims the Biden administration is operating with "one arm tied behind its back" in the Asia-Pacific.
articles.content: Australia's incoming ambassador to Washington, Kevin Rudd, has been accused of engaging in "opinionated lecturing" after he declared the United States needs to stop throwing its allies "under a bus" … [+2939 chars]

articles.title: 12 K-dramas with strong female characters to motivate you in 2023: The Glory, My Name, Little Women and more - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From badass fighter to resilient day-to-day hero, the land of Korean dramas has plenty of formidable female leads to spur you on as you take the new year by the horns.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed as investors look ahead to Fed minutes - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific shares traded mixed as investors look ahead to the Fed's meeting minutes, watching for signs of more interest rate hikes.
